trans-unit.source: Represents an `<issuerNameRegistry>` element in a configuration file.
The `<issuerNameRegistry>` element configures the issuer name registry.
The issuer name registry maps issuer tokens to a string name.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IssuerNameRegistryElement.Type%2A> property (which represents the `type` attribute of the element) can be set to register a custom type.
By default, a type of <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry> is assumed.

The `<issuerNameRegistry>` element can be specified at the service level under the `<identityConfiguration>` element or on a security token handler collection under the `<securityTokenHandlerConfiguration>` element.

The `IssuerNameRegistry` property of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfigurationElement> class and of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenHandlerConfigurationElement> class is an instance of <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IssuerNameRegistryElement>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IssuerNameRegistryElement"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a string representation of the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the issuer name registry.
It corresponds to the `type` attribute of the `<issuerNameRegistry>` element.
If it is not specified, the property is `null`, a type of <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry> is assumed.
The string representation of the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the issuer name registry.
The type must derive from the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.IssuerNameRegistry"></xref> class.
